text: Abhay. Tere liye ek adjective ki image hai dimaag mein but can’t describe ki. Tu mera sabse ___ dost tha. Apan late bond kiye kaafi I guess par apni convos kaafi endless hoti thi be. Bas yaa to tu chale jaata tha ya bhaga deta tha. And exam time aane nahi deta :p. Vaise jo tune first year ke baad comeback kiya hai kaafi bakchod tha. Not just CPI but image, interaction and bakchodi. Now when I think bakchod to tu first year se tha. I think apne beech mein kabhi bhi clubs nahi aaye. Likhne ko to kaafi hai be. Kitna bhulla kaata apan ne legit. And apni to branch bhi alag thi. Vaise to mein sochta hun branch vagarh se thoda distance aa jaata hai kyonki cheezen kam common ho jaati hai but apne topics to kabhi khatam hi nahi hue. Ab to yaad bhi nahi aa raha aisi kya baaten karte the etni. Vo adjective abhi bhi nahi aa raha words mein. Tere saath vaise kaafi similar sa feel hota tha. Apne hi type ka banda hai. I was the funny,good looking,smart one :p but you were the jigri one. ** tere karan hi campus mein 26 tak ruka tha. Nikal gaya saala. Bhai jab tu campus se gaya tha to legit esa hota tha either mein ghoomte ghoomte tere room mein almost ghus jaata ya apne room mein kaam karte karte bahar is purpose se jaane lagta. Chill hai chal, mil liye yaar fir se and photos bhi ho gayi saath mein. Bangalore kabhi aaya to sabse pehle tujhe hi call karunga. Sorry modi :). And since tu to poochega nahi, trip pe chalte hai bhai secoond wave ke baad. Bas plan ho to usko just ticket book karne se pehle cancel mat karna :p.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Wing mein ek bihari to hona hi chayie tha bhai. Kya kya kaand kiye tune. Khidki se khudna and teri GPL and tera GPL lena ka tarikka. Bhai bhai. Mast aadmi lagta the be kaafi. Hamesha apne andaaz mein khush rehta tha and bakchodi har vakt. Campus aana tha bhai. Apne bhaiyon mein tu hi nahi aaya. Mere to plans the tere saath cricket khelne ke. Chill hai chal.  Also yeh kya profile bana di portal pe. Tinder thodi hai bhai. Isse yaad aaya tere se tinder tips leni thi kaafi. Yaad kar liya karo kabhi bihar mein network aaye to :p.
author: Jay  Mundra

text:
Bahubali. Mein year book portal par pehle bahubali search kiya xd. The first nickname anyone got in our wing.Tere mein to takkat dikhti bhi thi varna to chidhane vaala naam ban jaata. Vaise I think apne first month mein hi I knew ki tu sabse reliable person hai IIT Kanpur mein and I think sab esse agree karte honge. Esa kuch khass incident yaad nahi hai but teri vibe hi aise hai. Mein sochta tha agar kabhi kuch major panga ho gaya kisi se campus mein to pehla call esi ko karunga. Vaise 3rd year mein apna hangout karna kaafi kam ho gaya tha dono busy the but I guess abhi jab campus aaye to first year ki vibe se mile the. 
And Bhai tujhe vo bed vaali cheez yaad hai bhai. First year mein tumhare room mein hi to pada rehta tha apne room se bhi jyada. And fir neend aa hi jaati thi xd. Aniket to utha deta tha “jay uth uth” karke. Uski awaz mein imagine kar. But tu bhola bhaala ensaan kaafi der dekhta rehta tha. Kaafi bahar to tu nahar kar aa raha hota tha fir tayyar hote hote aane jaane vaalo ko “mere bed pe jay soya hua hai” kehta rehta tha. Man agar yeh line tere memoir mein nahi milti to I would be kind of offended ki tujhe yaad nahi hai. And fraud to nahi maara bhai batti club mein :)  bhale hi etna chaapa na ho. But seriously kehna chahunga and it’s not only me, Tumhara aero club mein kaam dekh kar respect badh gayi thi bhai tere, kevlin ke liye kaafi. Baad mein laga shayad motivation alag raha ho :p but in the end to kaam matters.  Also Techmeet vaale ka chill hai bhai. Infact tu nahi tha to ofcourse mein tujhse expect nahi kar sakta na ki tujhe pata ho es baar kisne kya kiya. But I would say saamne se es baar jaan laga di thi bro. Tu 3-4 baar bol diya ese bata raha bro. Savage joke kharab kar diya tune baar baar bol kar. Bhai tu gurgaon aa jaa bas apartment ko hostel bana kar usi vibe mein rahenge.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Sanghi the CPI man. Na dare, na gym kare. Dassa maar dun man kare ya naa kare. Eski ek ek line suit kar rahi tere pe xd. Wing ka pehla dost. One of the earliest random memories of IIT kanpur I have is tere saath orientation ke day 1 (mostly. Varna day 2) hall 3 (probably) mein nasthe ki kaafi lambi line mein laga tha. Aur bhi wingies the but tu poore time apne bhai ka kuch kuch bata rha tha. Initially tera har sentence apne bhai ke baare mein hota tha. Infact mein bataya jo tha use repeat karte huve. Apna first interaction tu aur nikunj mere room pe aate to “ hi, hum tere bhai hai”. The most awkward 2 seconds of my IIT Kanpur life. “Bhai” word se kaafi obsessed tha may be tu :). Ab tere bhai ke paas to kaafi kuch hai bolne ke liye agar vo IIT Kanpur aaya to. Vo to shayad 1 saal tak bolta rahega. Vaise inspite of all these dasse, tu maggu nahi hai. Tu clubs mein nahi gaya but still wing ka sabse integeral part tha. Tune kaafi bonding badhai hai wing mein. Chill hai bhai yaad rakhna badi aadmi ban jaaye jab. Thoda to abhi hi ban gaya but abhi to yaad hi hoga na :). Loan vagarh poori wing vaale tujhse hi lenge. Esliye acche se kama le. Kabhi free ho to batana, Mini militia khelte hai.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Tere saath kaafi hangout to nahi kiya but IPL time tum jaise logon ke karan hi interesting tha. Akele dekhne mein kya maja. Jaise es baar tu,bihari tha nahi to mosly room pe akela dekhta tha. You and your obsession for hockey man. Kitna khela tu. vaise deep conversations bhi hui hai apni tujhe yaad ho to vo bhi thodi lambi. Bas kam hui. Aur haan MI se nafrat hai mujhe kyonki kuch jyada hi acche players hai. Sab international level ke hai usme bhi best. And tumhari team ko football mein haraya tha jo jyada mat udo. Thik hai :). Chal man keep your hockey vaala dedication and fire alive. To life mein kaafi chaap dega.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Awasthi. A few of the things I would change, if I could go back in time, is not hanging out with you more. Apan pehle se hi 11th mein kitne acche dost the be. 12th mein baat nahi hui but campus jab aaya to kota ke doston ke karan transition kaafi easy tha. Mainly to apan mein kabhi kuch common hua hi nahi esliye. Hall alag reh gaya and tum saalon mujhe hamesha bulate nahi jab satyam aata tha. Varna mast parties hoti be thoda plan karte uski visits to. Summers mein to mein bhi hall 12 hi ruk jaata. Fir bhi vaise mujhe lagta tha ki apan same company ya atleast city mein to jaayenge hi ki tu probably mera roommate hoga. Shayad not for now but it’s a small world may be future mein kabhi. Fir se Akshat ko prank call karenge. Prank to kya hi, Jay banke hi kiya tha vo pehchana nahi. Last etna hi kahunga ki tu probably un doston mein se hai jisko shayad mein 10 saal baad bhi call karunga kuch kaam pada to. Not of course kyonki mein etna selfish hun :) but tu etna reliable lagta hai. Milenge yaar kabhi to. Strong feel hai.
author: Jay  Mundra

text:
Honestly pehle pehle dekh ke laga tha ki you are arrogant kyonki tera game etna accha hai but jab khele to perception change ho gaya and dekha ki game ki true spirit vaala player hai bas ambitious hai. I still have to learn tu kaise peeche se ball 1 hand se doosre mein le aata hai.
All the best man.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Poker buddy. I am among those 100 people jisko tu pehle chapri lagta tha. TA ke project mein apan first time mile the. Tab laga esa nahi hai and funny banda hai. Tab tak to vaise tune vo hairstyle bhi badal thi. Mainly we bonded over poker and placements. Neil se jyada placements mein tere se baat ho jaati thi relatable and “help” bhi. Always been a fan of your wordplay and puns. Fir bhi caption nahi bata paaya tu. Poker mein luck ke karan jeet ta hai be tu and also is fact ke karan ki tu jeetata hai :p. Also thanks for giving motivation for keyboard. I know you can find a lot better versions on youtube so mere cover sunne ke liye thanks. Bhai kabhi same city mein ho to jarur milna.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: First friend at IITK. Mujhe vo pehla din yaad hai orientation ka jab mein paas mein aakar bheta tha and tune convo chalu kar di. Varna kaafi der tak awkward rehta :p. I guess apan starting mein hi hit kar gaye Kota ke karan may be. Mature and similar sa banda laga tha unlike others. Poora orientation tere saath hi nikla hai and PE bhi. Infact tere aur jaya ke laava to mujhe agle roll numbers bhi nahi pata aas paas ke. Kaafi chaap liya ECO mein. First year ke baad 0 hi ho gaya be interaction. Kuch common hi nahi tha isliye. Chill hai chal. Keep in touch.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: The silent guy of P1. Apan P1 mein bhi saath mein rahe. A* mein bhi gaye saath mein the. 12th mein hostel bhi same tha and then Branch bhi same. Pyscho mein ditch maarne ke liye sorry :p but maja to aaya tha kaafi bhulla kaatne mein. Sab mil kar ek doosre ka muh taakte rehte the :). Tune sahi likha vaise. Hostel bhi same hota to aur acche dost hote. Koi nahi, ab company and profile bhi same hai xd. So dekha jaaye to 6 saal to already ho chuke hai and more to go.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Always the funny and meme guy. Apan kota mein itne interact nahi kiye. Fir bhi 5 saal kahe bc 6 saal se jaanta hai tu mujhe and vice versa. Pehla deepak jo dipak likhta ho. Vaise tu bahar se etna serious and dedicated type ka lagta nahi hai. Only the people who knows you unhe pata hai. All the best man, keep up the spamming :).
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Probably pehla banda jisko dekh kar laga tha yeh to kuch bakchod kar hi lega campus mein. First year baad touch choot gaya vaise. Mein HSS mainly us group ke liye hi aata tha baaki aata to mujhe kuch nahi tha :p. Btw tune election time mujhe baad mein bola tha tum aaye kyon nahi to uska main reason yahi tha ki we were both firm on apne candidates with apne apne reason so mujhe laga aise dicussions avoid hi karne chayie and dosti mein nahi hi laane chayie. May be I was wrong. Kuch bada karo be life mein. Job vagarh suit nahi karegi tumhe.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Mujhe 4th year ke pehle tujhe dekh kar yeh yaad aata tha. “Vo banda jisne DRDO jeetaya”. Man maje aate kaafi 4th year offline hota to. Kaafi cheezen karni thi. Chill hai chal. Milte hai kabhi.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Brooo. Obviously, mera pehla kaafi acha dost at IIT Kanpur. And ofc mein HSS first year esliye hi itna jaata tha because of apna group and log. Baaki aata to mujhe kuch nahi tha. Likhne ko to bohot kuch hai yaar. Apna common love for OAT. And now when I think eska reason HSS hi ho probably. Vaise first year baad thoda interaction kam ho gaya comparatively ek to branch ke karan doosra tere vo wing vaale kaand ke karan. 1-2 mahine to mein esi mood mein tha bhai esko saath mein rehna hi nahi to kon upar jaaye faltu ke. Fir aalsi to mein hui hi obviously. And thode mood swings kam kara kar aur koi jhelenge nahi man. ofc sabse jyada baar tere se hi lada hoonga. Well mein to sirf leta tha ladta to tu hi tha. Vaise tujhe pata nahi hoga but aadhi baar mera motive yeh hota tha ki tu apni thodi harkaton ko public mein sudhar le. I had a friend in Kota usko bhi aise harkton se pehle farak nahi padta tha and kehta tha log kuch bhi kahe kya farak padta hai but later he thanked me ki tu sahi kehta tha and usse improve karna chayie. Aise koi particular cheezen nahi hai but I think you know what I am talking about and tu sudhar to gaya mostly. Publicly esa to ab shayad nahi karta jisse log tujhe judge karen. Shayad kaafi choti si baat ke baare mein kaafi likh diya kyonki pehle kabhi bataya nahi. Bro vaise mein kaafi baar aise hi kaam karte karte so jaata tha. Us vakt aa kar dhang se sulane ke liye thanks man. And I never thought I would say this but un sab pareshaan karni vaali gandi photos ke liye bhi thanks. Bhej dena bas. Aur bhai tu jealous taunts mat pass kara kar bhai dosti pe. Mein introspect karne lag jaata hun. Inhi taunts ke karan aaj apni kaafi acchi photo nahi hai saath mein. Jis din bola tha us din khicha lete. Chill hai ab band karte hai likhna hai to kaafi kuch. Thoda memories se hat ke gyan ki side ho gaya xd. - Your investor number 1
author: Jay  Mundra

text: The body-builder of the wing and stud to tu hai hi and unexpectedly thoda bihari bhi nikla. Apan har vakt hangout nahi kiye ofcourse but tumhare group mein jab bhi aata tha bohot acchi vibes aati thi. Bihari ki bakchodiyan and then amrendra kisi ki le raha hota tha. Aur tu koi sasta joke maar kar ke has raha hota tha :p. All the best man. PS DP to kaafi acchi hai etna kaise khicha leta hai bc.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Kaafi kuch to tune pehle hi likh diya. I think apni kaafi late baat hui hogi shayad 1.5 saal baad. Tujhe dekh ke esa lagta nahi but I would say jitne logon ko jaanta hun unme tu top mein hogi savage reply mein. May be occasionally but hai to sahi. I think maine bataya bhi tha tujhe baad mein. Secy group pe tere kuch replies ke saath vo “Ohhh” vaala meme sound chalni chayie thi. Esliye hi apni chat ki emoji Fire hai. Baaki nickname ki to false hopes to ab mein chhod chuka. And abhigyan ko us din ke liye kaafi already kos diya hoga. Pata nahi apan ne jyada haga ya jis type ka organisation chal raha tha. Kuch bhi ho raha tha xd. Prashant peehce se bol rahe the yeh bol do. I was like thik hai aap hi bol do na. Par chill hai, it was one of the memories that can be laughed upon later on. Mujhe to vaise us vakt bhi hassi aa rahi thi. Vaise I would say ki tu un logon mein se hai jo shayad doosre hall mein naa hote to shayad kaafi acche dost hote. Aur haan milenge jab tab tak foola nahi rahunga hopefully.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Apan basketball se bhi pehle treasure hunt mein mile the tujhe yaad ho to. Shoots kaafi improve kar liye bhai tune. 4 log ke beeche se daal deta tha. Naman vs doosri team ka match chalta tha bas. Milte hai kabhi if luck permits.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Man tera memoir likhna sabse tough hai. Infinite cheezen hai. Firstly thanks campus bulane ke liye varna mil nahi paate. Yeh point tu gina sakta hai abse jab bhi bolen tera presi banna kya kaam aaya. Vaise apan dost shayad first sem midsem ke time bane the. Fir shayad apan winters mein roz OAT jaate the na? Abe vaise apan first year winters mein roommate bhi the. I literally have no memory of that time. Haan bas yahi ki us time tak apan same level par the :p. And ofcourse you are the only person I envy at IITK. Kaafi maje kiye be apan ne yaar. Apan to us stage mein pahuch gaye the ki kuch bhi ulta-seedha ho to apan situation par haste rehte the. Kaafi exams ka saath mein padha be. Kaafi fun hota tha. Undoubtedly the most fun person at IITK tabhi tere se etne log obssesed the. Vaise tu sabse bada reason hoga ki meri college life single nikal gayi. (Not writing this as an accusation) Tere liye first year mein sahi mein respect aayi thi jab etne saare options ke bawjood bhi tu kisi ka kaat ta nahi tha (yaa thoda sa hi kaat ta tha:)). Also teri us party mein I was not sure ki it was water but since tu presi banne se jyada es baat se khush tha, I went with it. So, meri galti nahi thi. Vaise apan kabhi nahi lade be. Halke se bhi nahi. Debates hui kaafi random topics pe ofcourse. May be because hamesha galti tu hi karta tha :) fir tu directly/indirectly sorry bol deta tha fir khatam. This was the best part. Mein hamesha like 0 filter mode mein hota tha tere saath. Jo man mein aa raha, nahi bhi aa raha vo bhi bol do. Esliye hi techmeet vaali night ko tujhe koi content nahi mila xd. Thanks man for chossing IITK inspite of all the options. Campus ki best memories tere saath hi hai.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: pehli baar tera naam shayad AH sir ne jab poocha tha tab suna. Paramveer dharamvere raol. Etni bholi shakal par etna bhaari naam xd. Vaise sahi likha hai be tune. Apan kota mein bhi wingies rahge hai. Tu 310 mein tha na shayad kuch time and kanpur mein bhi. Intern bhi pehle nahi lagi then same jagah lagi. Bangalore mein bhi wingies hote jaane ko milta to. And haan feel to mujhe bhi yahi hai. Apan to mil hi lenge. Gurgaon noida paas mein hi hai.
author: Jay  Mundra

text:
Hindi mein likhna chahta tha but “meetha” se log galat samjhenge esliye you were one of the sweetest-mast-accha (teeno nahi be. teeno ka combination sort of which I am unable to describe) person according to me at the campus. Saanp bhi jod sakte hai Bioelectricity ko dekh kar.
PS Bhatia ko Koolness maine hi to sikhayi bhai. It’s just that coaches don’t play.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Wing ka sabse intelligent banda. Nikunj Neil mujhe first year se hi bolte the sabse jyada to sarthak chaapega wing mein. And pehle de shaw and now tower. And how can I not mention those double or may be single meaning one liners. Apne mein baad mein koi courses common rahe nahi but I remember MTH 102 ke endsem ke pehle ki night tere saath padh raha tha. Also, tu kabhi kisi ko help ke liye mana nahi karta bro. Kaafi humble ensaan hai. Aise hi rahiyo aur kabhi koi fayda utha raha ho to wing vaale group pe likh dena bas.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: Vo banda jisne sabse jyada chaapa hoga SnT mein. Apan to first year project se saath mein hai. Fir bhi bonding to thodi late hui thi. Coordi banne ke baad. And last year Inter IIT se tune apni bakchodi sabko dikha chalu kar diya. No fear when SRD is here. Anyways kaafi polite and accha insaan hai. Keep in touch.
author: Jay  Mundra

text: I don’t have much to write here kyonki apan court ke bahar etne hangout nahi kiye but I always felt ki tu fun and accha banda hai. Stud to tu hai hi:). I would just like to thank you man. Basketball meri campus life ka ek integral and memorable part raha and tere bina possible nahi tha. Tu hi enthi se poori wing ko lekar aata tha.
author: Jay  Mundra

text:
Probably the most hasmukh banda at the court except for when naman se lad raha ho :p. Jeete, haare tu maje mein hi rehta tha. And jab corona ho hi gaya to late jaakar accha kiya na maine? And tu and naman to kaafi ghaple kiye ho score mein to naa hi bolo xd.
Also man tu same city mein ho to bolna. Ek konse se doosre pe aa jaayenge raat ko basketball khelne.
author: Jay  Mundra
